text: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۖ وَمَآ أَمْرُ فِرْعَوْنَ بِرَشِيدٍ

translation.en.sahih: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they followed the command of Pharaoh, and the command of Pharaoh was not [at all] discerning.
translation.id.indonesian: kepada Fir'aun dan pemimpin-pemimpin kaumnya, tetapi mereka mengikut perintah Fir'aun, padahal perintah Fir'aun sekali-kali bukanlah (perintah) yang benar.
